content: I don't have any personal preferences, but according to experts and travelers, some of the best national parks to visit for first-timers are grand canyon national park, yellowstone national park, and yosemite national park. these parks offer stunning natural landscapes and plenty of opportunities for hiking, camping, and wildlife viewing. they are also some of the most popular national parks in the united states, so they offer well-developed infrastructure, visitor centers, and accessible amenities. however, it's important to plan ahead and be mindful of peak season crowds and limited availability for accommodations and activities.
